title: Poster, 2010-21-17, 1978–1979
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: Cartoon-like, bright image: blue sky, green-skinned man with brown hair and sunglasses, wearing a blue shirt and yellow cowboy hat, holding a blue steering wheel and sitting in purple car seat. On his hat are two crouching police officers, and circling the hat is a helicopter seeking to land. At upper right, in magenta, is the title: "MISTRZ / KIEROWNICY / UCIEKA", surrounded by credits in smaller type.
